name: 3DLandscape
tagline: C# XNA 4.0-based free flight viewer with shaders for reflection/refraction
body:
3D terrain viewer based on [Riemers XNA tutorials](http://www.riemers.net/eng/Tutorials/XNA/Csharp/series1.php) updated to work with XNA 4.0 and newer shaders. Features:
- First-person mouse view and keyboard movements
- Multitexturing based on view distance
- Bump-mapped water with shader-driven refractions and specular reflections
